column2:
"My name is Kyokuya.
But I cannot remember anything more than that..."

"Whenever I try, it feels as though my head is filled with endless darkness...
Darkness? I think something is coming back to me..."

"Hm? You... I remember you.
Do you know me?
Can you... tell me who I am?"

"...I'm a wolf? I don't know what that means, but...
Perhaps I'll remember something if I see a wolf...?
My apologies, but I'll have to ask for your help."
